docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt-get -qqy update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates gnupg2     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
docker.raw: RUN apt-get -qqy update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates gnupg2     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt-key adv --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys "539A 3A8C 6692 E6E3 F69B 3FE8 1D85 E93F 801B B43F"     && echo "deb https://download.rethinkdb.com/apt bionic main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rethinkdb.list
docker.raw: RUN apt-key adv --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys "539A 3A8C 6692 E6E3 F69B 3FE8 1D85 E93F 801B B43F"     && echo "deb https://download.rethinkdb.com/apt bionic main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rethinkdb.list

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt-get -qqy update 	&& apt-get install -y rethinkdb=$RETHINKDB_PACKAGE_VERSION 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
docker.raw: RUN apt-get -qqy update 	&& apt-get install -y rethinkdb=$RETHINKDB_PACKAGE_VERSION 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
